feed.title: Category: Donkey Kong Country Returns | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Donkey Kong Country Returns (Wii, 2010) (5)
entry.content: We played three levels tonight. It was pretty fun. My wife and I had a bit of a disagreement about what was fun about the game. She really likes collecting everything and exploring the area, trying to do harder things. In contrast, I find that annoying and prefer to just go through the obstacle course as fast as possible. But, the secret of marital bliss is she tells me what to do, and I do it, so I repented. =)

entry.title: Game: Donkey Kong Country Returns (Wii, 2010) (4)
entry.content: We just played 4-4 and the barrel vehicle had ridiculous controls. Worse than swimming in a normal game.

entry.title: Game: Donkey Kong Country Returns (Wii, 2010) (3)
entry.content: This game is so cheap with lives... taking two when you die once with two players, not allowing you to use the barrels if they are there at the checkpoint. It's annoying.

entry.title: Game: Donkey Kong Country Returns (Wii, 2010) (2)
entry.content: We started playing this once a week today.

entry.title: Game: Donkey Kong Country Returns (Wii, 2010)
entry.content: The controls in this game are really strange after playing NSMBW for so long. Also, it seems a lot easier than Mario in the platforming, but less forgiving overall (Mario has bubbles, plentitude of extra lives, etc.)
